sent.orig: Who then is Jesus or Buddha or any other that many perceive as god?
sent.trans: 那么，谁是耶稣或佛陀(Buddha)或者许多人所觉察为神的任何其他？

sent.orig: Our pattern recognition system is set into motion every time our senses perceive something.
sent.trans: 每次当我们的感官有所察觉时，我们的模式识别系统也将有所行动。

sent.orig: If we do something interesting that doesn't sell, we don't perceive that as a success.
sent.trans: 如果我们做的东西很有意思，但卖不出去，我们认为这不能算成功。

sent.orig: One may also perceive one's future journey home through future ancestors.
sent.trans: 一个人也可以藉由未来的后裔感知未来的回家旅途。

sent.orig: The difference affects how we perceive the subject matter.
sent.trans: 颜色差异会影响我们看待事物时的主观感觉。
